text: eemaan vaalon mein jo akaaran apane gharon mein rah jaate hain aur jo allaah kee raah mein apane dhanon aur praanon ke dvaara jihaad karate hain, donon baraabar nahin ho sakate. allaah ne unhen jo apane dhanon tatha praanon ke dvaara jihaad karate hain, unapar jo gharon mein rah jaate hain, pad mein pradhaanata dee hai aur pratyek ko allaah ne bhalaee ka vachan diya hai aur allaah ne jihaad karane vaalon ko unapar, jo gharon mein baithe rah jaane vaale hain, bade pratiphal mein bhee pradhaanata dee hai
